data.name: Squirrelmageddon! Demo
data.detailed_description:
About the Game

Squirrelmageddon! is an indi solo developer game of an experimental indi, dark humor, 3rd / 1st Person, arcade like, sci-fi, run and gun, high score squirrel wave shooter for 1-4 LAN or online players.

The SQUIRRELMAGEDDON! DEMO includes Hive mission zone maps and missions.

The year is 2184. Humans have been living underground for over 100 years. In this impossible future, genetically modified mutant squirrels have eaten every living thing on the planet. They have come down from the trees and now rule the planet as it's new caretakers.

Accept missions and play as a soldier or a 'chipped' squirrel. In multiplayer, killed soldiers will spawn as a chipped squirrel.

WARNING: this game contains extreme human on squirrel and squirrel on human violence. There is no political correctness in this game. If you are offended by the idea of violently exterminating bloodthirsty mutant squirrels, this game is not for you.

CURRENT FEATURE LIST:

- 8 Playable Hive Soldier characters
- Playable Chipped Squirrels (in single and multiplayer)
- Branching Mission system with objectives
- Continuing mission at game over keeps objective progress to reduce grind
- Random time of day and fog weather
- persistent unit armory (weapons found are usable by all characters)
- primary and secondary weapon load-outs
- Earn credits per mission
- Hive shop to sell and buy goods
- Hive soldier training and skill unlocks
- Progressive campaign with mission zone unlocks
- 1-4 players LAN or Online (local listen server)
- 3rd person primary with 1st person camera hotkey
- 7 squirrel sizes
- 14 Weapons (including Proximity Mines and Grenades)
- Deploy and relocate Sonic Plasma Turrets
- Move barricades, crates and other objects in Single Player
- Persistent mission maps. Objects will spawn where you last left them on the map.
- Reset moved objects option
- Weapon levels and proficiency progression
- 10 mission maps
- 40+ missions
- Squirrelball mini-game
- Orbs of Delight (4x damage, run speed boost, 4x points [stackable])
- Point pickups (items, recyclables, intel gathering)

data.short_description: Squirrelmageddon! is an indi, dark humor, shooter for 1-4 players. In an apocalyptic future, genetically modified mutant squirrels roam the Earth as the new apex predator. Humans, living underground for over 100 years, are re-emerging. Your mission is clear, find a way to eradicate the enemy...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® 5th Generation - i3-5010U or similar
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® 6th Generation - i5 or similar
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon VII or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
